data.body: Do you mind explaining your use case?

Hello. 

Yes i just saw use cases in your submission guidelines:

I'm reading your scene-format JSON guidelines and I dont see anything in my revisions that fit with that. Would you mind updating it in order to process my PR ? Such as a separate project.json file which contains only names of resource and files, as well as refolderizing the editor examples, eg

examples/arkanoid.json

-->

examples/arkanoid/project.json
examples/arkanoid/scene.json
examples/arkanoid/camera.json
examples/arkanoid/js/User.js
examples/arkanoid/js/Game Logic.js

The reason being ...
